name: Bathroom Chef
description:
Take a break and cook up some delicious food for your friends! Create full-sized meals right in the bathroom chef's kitchen. Cooking with this revolutionary method involves a graceful balancing of stress and gas. It sounds easy but there are always unexpected events that can back you up. Collect Poop Points and upgrade your chef's skills, easing the great challenges ahead. Crank up the sound and let everyone know you're cooking something just for them! Enjoy endless levels and hundreds of upgrade ranks for hours of culinary bathroom humor.

Features:
Endless Levels
Upgrade Shop
Random Events + Rewards
Culinary Bathroom Humor
